products.title: Real Silk Vanilla  Roman Blind
products.description: With a shade as soft as they come, and slubs as heavenly as the clouds above, this real silk vanilla roman blind is what pure luxury truly means. Plus with the special uv protective lining sewn on too, you can be rest assured that this blind will look splendid for many more days with a shade as soft as they come, and slubs as heavenly as the clouds above, this real silk vanilla roman blind is what pure luxury truly means.

products.title: Madelyn Velvet Chalk White Roman Blind
products.description: How do you make a sumptuous velvet roman blind even more luxurious? Add a beautiful tuiss design, thats how. products.title: Madelyn Linen Chalk White Roman Blind
products.description: With its simple, neutral colour-way and striking pattern, this stately fabric simply oozes elegance and sophistication. This perfect combination of colours is set onto a gorgeously textured, open-weave fabric, to add a sumptuous feel and look that only enhances the classy s with its simple, neutral colour-way and striking pattern, this stately fabric simply oozes elegance and sophistication.

products.title: Faux Suede, White - Roman Blind
products.description: The faux suede in white takes a lightweight, suede-feel cloth and covers it with a sea of pure white, making for an icy cool blind that gets its warmth from its soft texture. This supple fabric will fold easily into the pleated curves of the roman, leaving a dreamy and wistful ambience. The white offers a beautifully clean aesthetic, making it the perfect base from which to add brighteror darker hues with plenty of personality.

products.title: Liliana Chalk Roman Blind
products.description: Soft and cosy with a beautifully organic texture, this liliana chalk roman blind will add the most delicate of touches to your window. Ideal for use in a room with a more neutral, natural theme, this slightly off-white fabric will provide a gentle contrast to your room and brin soft and cosy with a beautifully organic texture, this liliana chalk roman blind will add the most delicate of touches to your window.

products.title: Chantilly Antique White Roman Blind Roman Blind
products.description: We simply adore the subtle elegance of the chantilly antique white roman blind. The light and creamy tone adds a touch of warmth and would look right at home in any space. Plus, a sophisticated pattern adorns the fabric too, bringing character and texture and finishing your in we simply adore the subtle elegance of the chantilly antique white roman blind.

products.title: Bird Garden, Canvas - Roman Blind
products.description: Incorporate the enchanting bird garden canvas into your dcor for a sophisticated look with charming detail, where a soft, cotton-like fabric hosts a display of feathered friends and creative foliage in soothing white on a mild oatmeal background. Display the canvas amid layers of splendid linen in harmonising caramel and biscuit shades, framing the blind with honeyed fabrics and complementing colours.

products.title: Marta Chalk Roman Blind
products.description: Our marta chalk roman blind is the epitome of elegance and grace. The off-white, cream shading of the blind will give your room a chic and clean look, perfect for those wanting to create a tranquil and magical environment. The versatile colour will look fabulous in most home their marta chalk roman blind is the epitome of elegance and grace.

products.title: Snowdrop Dovegrey Roman Blind
products.description: A modern blind doesnt have to be stark or in your face. It can be soft, tranquil and host a touch of energy, just look at this snowdrop dovegrey roman blind. Part of their scion living collection, its the collaboration between the great designers themselves and their own fabulo a modern blind doesnt have to be stark or in your face.

products.title: Animal Magic Chalk Roman Blind
products.description: From the tall giraffes to the tiny frogs, a whole kingdom of animals has come together to bring extreme cuteness and plenty of fun to your windows. products.title: Taimi Chalk Roman Blind
products.description: Scion doesnt do anything by halves, and that includes mastering the scandinavian style. Soft, cool colours are showcased in a simple yet repetitive pattern and of course surrounded by oodles of white. products.title: William Morris Strawberry Thief Rose Chalk Roman Blind

products.title: Windsor, White - Roman Blind
products.description: Pure and simple, the windsor white is the colour of snow, and adds a cool and refreshing vibe to the home without compromising on class or elegance. This light and pretty shade forms a beautiful roman blind, strengthened in appearance by the shimmering sheen of the silk-like fabric. The white can be paired with any colour combination you choose. It will look particularly attractive against a petrol blue shade to craft a contemporary nautical look in the bathroom.

products.title: Bella Frost Roman Blind

products.title: Nairobi, Snow - Roman Blind
products.description: The nairobi in snow adds a casual sense of glamour to any room, with its chocolate animal print and beautiful sketches. The fabric contains linen, giving it lasting durability as well as that classic linen look and feel. Hang the snow amidst similar browns and creams, and consider a deep chocolate feature wall for a striking look. Add shimmering golds and plush camels for a truly luxurious style, and be sure to throw in plenty of soft fabrics for extra comfort.

products.title: Puritan Dove White Roman Blind
